thread.section_title: Avas Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Avas Flowers | avasflowers.com | 13 of 317
thread.title: Grace

author: Grace
title: Grace
text: I have never dealt with a company that has made me feel like my order meant nothing. I was depending on this delivery and instead my daughter's birthday was ruined because we waited around for a delivery that never came! Dinner reservations canceled then having to wait an additional 2 hours at her favorite restaurant for a table because of the horrible customer service. I will be reporting this to BBB and posting this as a review!!!!
